summary: The customer was inquiring about Contoso Wireless's product streaming service and payment options. The agent provided information on the various payment options available, including credit card, debit card, PayPal, Apple Pay and monthly subscription plans with a 10% discount. The agent also explained additional features of the product streaming service such as an online library with over 10 million titles and exclusive discounts on new releases. Finally, the agent provided instructions on how to sign up for the service.
